abstract: This viewgraph presentation provides information on the development of a system by which aircraft pilots will be warned of turbulence. This networked system of in situ sensors will be mounted on various aircraft all of which are linked through a ground based parabolic antenna. As its end result, this system will attempt to reduce the number of accidents arising from turbulence.
title: Airborne Turbulence Warning System Development

publications.publicationName: Proceedings of the Second NASA Aviation Safety Program Weather Accident Prevention Review

related.title: Proceedings of the Second NASA Aviation Safety Program Weather Accident Prevention Review
